metadata.title: CVE-2022-24065 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The package cookiecutter before 2.1.1 are vulnerable to Command Injectionvia hg argument injection. When calling the cookiecutter function fromPython code with the checkout parameter, it is passed to the hg checkoutcommand in a way that additional flags can be set. The additional flags canbe used to perform a command injection.

criterions.comment: cookiecutter: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
